short_description: innomotics is an auto parts manufacturer based in nuremberg, germany.
long_description: redefining reliable motion for a better tomorrow. with a trusted legacy of more than 150 years of siemens engineering expertise, we are and have always been the backbone of reliable motion for industries and infrastructure worldwide. now, we're about to take this to the next level. it's time for a new brand. our mission is to support you, our customers and partners, and your business on the road to the future – sustainable, digital, reliable. deeply rooted in our heritage, we're strengthening what's in it for you. we are your proven end-to-end partner with leading solutions – sustainable, digital, 24/7, on-site. from clean energy to industrial iot, megatrends are transforming how we use drive technologies to move and manufacture, produce and process. our holistic and visionary solutions bring together reliable products, systems, and services. we build them to help you navigate increasing complexity with ease and take advantage of innovations in a fast-changing landscape. we serve almost all industries, from chemicals, oil & gas to utilities, from fiber to automotive and marine, from water to waste water.
